EmailTemplate.name: Global_Events_DSS_Q413.Final Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Be Among the Unicorns/Data Scientists at DataBeat's Data Science Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://databeat2013.eventbrite.com/?discount=DSSalum>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Data scientists are like unicorns — they are hard to find and possess a divergence of skills including analytics, computer science, modeling, statistics and most important, the ability to be a good storyteller. Join your peers next week at DataBeat's Data Science Summit <http://venturebeat.com/events/databeat2013/> where the "who's who" of data science will be speaking.
What's New
The two-day agenda is packed with new content including a segment called, "Data Science in Action" where we'll hear first-hand about the latest tools and innovations in data science. This year, we are hosting a "Data Visualization Challenge" around the theme of health. The visualizations will be on display and a panel of judges will be selecting winners for cash prizes during the summit. Submit your visualization here <http://visualizing.org/contests/call-submissions-data-science-summit-2013>.
<http://venturebeat.com/events/databeat2013/>
Exclusive Discount
Please use the exclusive Data Science Summit discount <http://databeat2013.eventbrite.com/?discount=DSSalum> to get 25% off the current registration price.
Enjoy your Thanksgiving holiday and I look forward to seeing you next Wednesday in Redwood City.
Richard Snee Event Co-Chair CMO, Pivotal
Who's Speaking?. View the List >> <http://venturebeat.com/events/databeat2013/speakers/>
VentureBeat Digs Deep Read Now >> <http://venturebeat.com/2013/11/18/venturebeat-digs-deep-with-databeatdata-science-summit/>
